executable.title: Expert Automated Registration
executable.description: Provides rigid, affine, and BSpline registration methods via a simple GUI
executable.contributor: Stephen R Aylward, Casey B Goodlett
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

image.name: fixedImage
image.label: Fixed Image
image.description: Image which defines the space into which the moving image is registered

image.name: movingImage
image.label: Moving Image
image.description: The transform goes from the fixed image's space into the moving image's space

transform.name: loadTransform
transform.label: Load transform
transform.description: Load a transform that is immediately applied to the moving image

transform.name: saveTransform
transform.label: Save transform
transform.description: Save the transform that results from registration

string-enumeration.name: initialization
string-enumeration.description: Method to prime the registration process
string-enumeration.label: Initialization

parameters.label: Advanced Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how registration is performed

string-enumeration.name: verbosityLevel
string-enumeration.description: Level of detail of reporting progress
string-enumeration.label: Verbosity level

boolean.name: sampleFromOverlap
boolean.description: Limit metric evaluation to the fixed image region overlapped by the moving image
boolean.label: Sample from fixed/moving overlap

image.name: fixedImageMask
image.label: Fixed Image Mask
image.description: Image which defines a mask for the fixed image

integer.name: randomNumberSeed
integer.description: Seed to generate a consistent random number sequence
integer.label: Random number seed (0=none)

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.description: Number of CPU threads to use
integer.label: Number of threads (0=max)

boolean.name: minimizeMemory
boolean.description: Reduce the amount of memory required at the cost of increased computation time
boolean.label: Minimize memory

string-enumeration.name: interpolation
string-enumeration.description: Method for interpolation within the optimization process
string-enumeration.label: Interpolation

parameters.label: Advanced Initial Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how initial registration is performed

point.name: fixedLandmarks
point.description: Ordered list of landmarks in the fixed image
point.label: Fixed landmarks

point.name: movingLandmarks
point.description: Ordered list of landmarks in the moving image
point.label: Moving landmarks

parameters.description: Parameters that determine how registration is performed

integer.description: Maximum number of rigid optimization iterations
integer.label: Rigid Max Iterations

float.name: rigidSamplingRatio

parameters.label: Advanced Affine Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how registration is performed

integer.name: affineMaxIterations
integer.description: Maximum number of affine optimization iterations
integer.label: Affine Max Iterations

float.name: affineSamplingRatio
float.description: Portion of the image to use in computing the metric during affine registration
float.label: Affine sampling ratio

parameters.label: Advanced BSpline Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how registration is performed

integer.name: bsplineMaxIterations
integer.description: Maximum number of bspline optimization iterations
integer.label: BSpline Max Iterations

float.name: bsplineSamplingRatio
float.description: Portion of the image to use in computing the metric during BSpline registration
float.label: BSpline sampling ratio

integer.description: Number of pixels between control points
integer.label: Control point spacing (pixels)
